extendedInfo.description: If you are Big Time Rush's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Big Time Rush's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Big Time Rush's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Big Time Rush's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- BTR- Elevate- 24/Seven************************List of lyrics ************************- 24/Seven- All Over Again- Big Night- Big Time Rush- Blow Your Speakers- Boyfriend- City Is Ours- Confetti Falling- Count On You- Cover Girl- Crazy For U- Elevate- Epic- Get Up- Halfway There- I Know You Know- If I Ruled The World- Invisible- Like Nobody's Around- Love Me Again- Love Me Love Me- Music Sounds Better With You- No Idea- Nothing Even Matters- Oh Yeah- Paralyzed- Picture This- Show Me- Song For You- Stuck- Superstar- This Is Our Someday- Til I Forget About You- Time Of Our Life- Worldwide- You're Not Alone

reviews.title: It great
reviews.comment: Its great but it needs all of btr\'s songs .
reviews.author: Kyle Davis
